name: FROOT LOOT
description:
Froot is falling from the sky! Blocks are too! And time is running out. Catch the froot before it hits the ground and beat your high score! As the blocks pile high and the you catch more froot, this will not be easy. Remember to jump! Recommend playing fullscreen.

Controls:

Up Arrow - Jump

Left Arrow - Run Left

Right Arrow - Run Right

X - Sprint powerup

Z - Increase Froot fallspeed

Collect 10 froots without dropping and you'll clear the bottom row of block!

Froot Loot is Taylor Buchheit's submission for OMGJam4. It encompasses all three themes: Food, Gravity, and Loot. This game was made entirely in Pico-8 between June 29th and July 1st 2018.
